entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
